parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
Check for below Scenario from Application Data Capture
Scenario:Verify Upload of PAN/Form 60 is mandatory under following scenarios for New Business/ Portability
>when premium >50k and payment mode is cash
>when premium > 1 lac and payment mode is cash or cheque
2) Product Name : Group Aarogya sanjeevani
3) Policy Plan :  Non Family Floater
4) Business Type : New Business
5) Members : 3A (Self + Spouse + Mother)
6) Highest Highest Member Age Band  : 
Self : 42 age ,SI : 4.5 Lac
Spouse :42 age ,SI : 3.5Lac
Father :50 age ,SI : 1.5Lac
Level 1 : After collection process while submitting the proposal system should trigger the error message
Trigger point: Upload of PAN/Form 60 should be mandatory under following scenarios for New Business
>when premium greater than 50k and payment mode is cash
>when premium greater than 1 lac and payment mode is cash or cheque
9) VP: system should restrict for below
>when premium greater than 50k and payment mode is cash
> when premium greater than 1 lac and payment mode is cash or cheque then Upload of PAN/Form 60 should be mandatory
